Develop and produce creative content for social media platforms (Instagram, TikTok, Facebook etc).

Monitor trending topics and adapt content to increase engagement and audience reach.

Male/female
Proven experience creating content for social media, blogs, or digital platforms.
Strong writing, storytelling, and visual communication skills.
Ability to plan, produce, and edit photo/video content.
Familiarity with digital marketing, branding, and current online trends.
Basic knowledge of analytics tools and performance tracking.
Creative thinking, attention to detail, and ability to meet deadlines.
